title: THIS JOURNEY IS YOURS. PACE IT, OWN IT, PROGRESS WITH PURPOSE
description: Amrita, your steady, thoughtful approach is your greatest asset as you deepen your mastery of foundational skills like interpreting words in context and solving systems of equations. This phase is about disciplined rebuilding—strengthening your understanding of sentence boundaries and nonlinear functions with deliberate, consistent effort. Embrace the micro-challenges ahead as opportunities to stretch beyond comfort without sacrificing your calm focus. Remember, true balance comes from knowing when to push yourself thoughtfully, not from avoiding difficulty. Your ability to remain composed under pressure and reflect on your progress will sustain your momentum. Keep leveraging your self-awareness to navigate this phase with patience and purpose. Each small win builds the resilience and precision you need to elevate your score toward 1590. Trust the process—you are progressing steadily, and your potential is unfolding with every disciplined step.
